attributes.action: Provide disabled people with the winter fuel allowance and free tv licence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Disabled people face the same challenges as the old in keeping warm and so should receive the same winter fuel allowance. Disabled people are also more often than not forced to spend long hours at home . They would benefit greatly from a free tv licence just as pensioners do

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
